Class AnnotatedPTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTree
            • ptolemy.vergil.tree.PTree
              • org.kepler.gui.AnnotatedPTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotatedActorFirePTree, AnnotatedActorIOPTree

    public class AnnotatedPTree
extends PTree
    A Wrapper class that adds right click support and custom Kepler Ontology icons to a PTree
    Since:
    February 17, 2005, Kepler 1.0
    Author:
    Chad Berkley
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
